derivation: from H8176 (שָׁעַר) in its original sense;
outline:
1. gate
    1. gate (of entrance)
    2. gate (of space inside gate, i.e. marketplace, public meeting place)
      1. city, town
    3. gate (of palace, royal castle, temple, court of tabernacle)
    4. heaven
strongs_def: an opening, i.e. door or gate
